name: Clif Bar Sierra Trail Mix Energy Bar
description:
Trail mix is awesome, but eating it on the go can be a bit tricky. Clif has solved the problem with their Sierra Trail Mix bar. Easy to eat, and it has all the ingredients you love.Ingredients: Organic brown rice syrup, Clifpro® (soy rice crisps [soy protein isolate, rice flour, barley malt extract], organic roasted soybeans, organic soy flour), organic rolled oats, organic peanuts, chocolate chips (dried cane syrup, unsweetened chocolate*, cocoa butter*, soy lecithin, vanilla extract), organic raisins, organic cane syrup, organic peanut butter (organic peanuts, salt), Clifcrunch® (organic oat fiber, inulin, organic psyllium), roasted pumpkin seeds, roasted sunflower seeds (sunflower seeds, sunflower oil), organic date paste, sea salt, natural flavors, natural vitamin E (antioxidant).
*Rainforest Alliance Certified™Clif sources ingredients that are not genetically engineered.70% organic ingredients.
